author: Alexi McCammond
title: DNC to postpone convention until August due to coronavirus outbreak
description: The Democratic National Committee is expected to announce later today that its July convention will be postponed until August because of the coronavirus, according to two sources familiar with the plans. Why it matters: The global pandemic is changing the fun…
content:
The Democratic National Committee is expected to announce later today that its July convention will be postponed until August because of the coronavirus, according to two sources familiar with the plans.
